meanings.definition: The time during which something continues.
meanings.sent1: The durations of the movie were too long for the children to sit through.
meanings.sent2: I measured the durations of each song in the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nap durations always seemed to coincide with my study time.
meanings.sent4: The durations of the rain showers matched the length of my morning walks.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used hourglass timers to teach the concept of durations to the students.

meanings.definition: The length of time that something lasts.
meanings.sent1: The durations of the battery life surprised me.
meanings.sent2: We discussed the durations of the meeting before scheduling it.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved making the durations of the show seem longer.
meanings.sent4: The durations of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's endurance was tested by the durations of the marathon.
